评论详情: I am a little surprised I like this so much given the color and print. Very flattering cut. I received a lot of compliments when I wore it to work. It hit below the knee for me and I'm 5'8".

I really liked the dress when I tried it on but it was extremely longer than depicted. For that reason alone I returned it. It made me look shorter. It was at least 3-4 inches below the knee. Very nice print and extremely soft fabric.
